checkEquip(Characters) - Static method in class com.warsarehell.rpg.framework.Board
Prints out the player's information: Name, current weapon, current armor, current level, max life points, current life points, strength level and attack level.
checkInv(Characters, Weapons, Armor) - Method in class com.warsarehell.rpg.object.Inventory
Asks the player which inventory they want to access, it then gives them option on the action to take.
checkJobProgress(Characters, Characters) - Static method in class com.warsarehell.rpg.framework.Board
After every fight, this method checks to see if the enemy defeated is one of the enemies in the current job(s) the player has, and if so it subtracts it from the total.
checkMap(Characters) - Static method in class com.warsarehell.rpg.framework.Board
Prints out the map with the player symbol in it.
checkSpecialEnemies(Characters, Characters) - Static method in class com.warsarehell.rpg.framework.Board
Checks if the enemy defeated was a special enemy with a unique drop.
checkState(Characters) - Static method in class com.warsarehell.rpg.framework.Board
Runs calculations to check if the player will be allowed to more without encountering enemies, run into another character (WIP), or asked to start the end game quest.
